response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. We're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $110, considering how much it could enhance your experience. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that's worth $120 to you at a competitive rate. We hope you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 110}
